post.author: 이상윤
post.content:
Hi Dave

Diverse Technical Professionals, on behalf of our client, is looking for an experienced MS Sharepoint Developer for a 6 month contract position.

If you or anyone you know who might be interested, please contact me at zeeshanb@diversetechnical.com. Your help in this regard is highly appreciated.

Specific details of this position are as follows.

Location: Toronto (Downtown)
Position: Sharepoint Developer
Type: Contract  - Initial 6 months
Rate: Negotiable
Start date: ASAP

Technical Requirements: (MUST HAVE)
1. Hands-on experience with SharePoint Services Web Services (List Data Retrieval Service, Lists Service etc. etc.)
2. Hands-on experience with creating and deploying WebParts.
3. Hands-on experience with C# and ASP.NET (1.1 or 2.0)
4. MS-Office programming (Excel, Access, PowerPoint, Word)
5. Database design and RDBMS like MS SQL Server and MS Access
6. Minimum 5 years of Software development experience.
7. XML and XSLT

Other Skills:
1. MUST have excellent communication and interpersonal skills
2. Ability to own a project from start to finish, including technical documentation, user guide and implementation documentation.
3. Must work independently as well as contribute to team efforts.

If you meet the requirements, please send your resume to zeeshanb@diversetechnical.com with subject id: Sharepoint_DTP001

Note: If you do not wish to receive future opportunities from Diverse Technical Professionals, please reply to this email notifying us of such intent.
post.title: SharePoint Developer Contract
